articles.description: Still with major needs at offensive tackle, defensive end and 3-technique after the initial waves of free agency, Poles likely will need to parlay picks No. 53, 61 and 64 into two or three starters or immediate contributors for a needed boost in 2023.

articles.description: Discontent over the quality and smoothness of the Austin track surface has once again been raised by MotoGP riders ahead of the 2023 race.
articles.content:

articles.title: Ex-NBA star Shawn Kemp charged with assault in March shooting - ESPN
articles.description: Former NBA star Shawn Kemp has been charged with first-degree assault in a parking lot shooting in March, with prosecutors in Washington state saying that Kemp showed his intent in a text message he sent just before the shooting.
